title: Albuquerque Police Reach Settlement To Address Excessive Force
teaser: Albuquerque Police have reached a settlement agreement with the Justice Department over use-of-force policies. The police have agreed to take steps to address issues that led to, what the Justice Department claims, is a pattern of unconstitutional uses of force.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
